VVV3.DE.summary: ÃKOWORLD AG, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment business in Germany. The company offers annuities, occupational pensions, and retirement and investment funds; and insurance brokerage services. It serves institutional investors, financial service providers, and private investors. The company was formerly known as versiko AG and changed its name to ÃKOWORLD AG in December 2013. ÃKOWORLD AG was founded in 1975 and is based in Hilden, Germany.
